# Fundus Image Comparator and Classifier 

Purpose: For setting up a static page where users can do pairwise comparison and individual classifications for a set of images

## Instructions for use 
This webpage was dockerized and uploaded to Amazon AWS for distribution. 

1. Set up an Amazon AWS server (recommend free tier for small scale use)
2. SFTP the dockerfile to your server root directory
3. Create docker image 
  -Will add specific configuration instructions
4. Run server and access webpage using the following (replace 8080 with your port of choice):
  ```python -m SimpleHTTPServer 8080```
